uvi.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.4.126
uvi.description:
spi: bcm2835: Fix out-of-bounds access with more than 4 slaves

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.126 by commit b5502580cf958b094f3b69dfe4eece90eae01fbc, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 571e31fa60b3697d5db26140e16d5c45c51c9815. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: spi: bcm2835: Fix out-of-bounds access with more than 4 slaves
